author: Delia Echavarri
title: La chaqueta rebajada a mitad de precio de Zara: muy elegante y perfecta para el frÃ­o por 19,99 â‚¬
text:
Si estÃ¡s buscando una prenda que sea cÃ³moda, confortable, bonita y que ademÃ¡s te proteja correctamente del frÃ­o, tienes que echar un vistazo al apartado de Special Prices de Zara porque vende moda para hombre y para mujer tirada de precio . Si la semana pasada ya debutÃ³ con la cazadora efecto piel , ahora ha rebajado casi a la mitad esta chaqueta de punto para mujer.
Esta prenda de oversize es una de esas piezas de ropa que dan luz y elegancia a cualquier conjunto. Esta chaqueta tiene un gran potencial, ademÃ¡s de mucha utilidad , y es que puedes llevarla tanto en las noches frÃ­as de primavera, como prenda exterior en otoÃ±o o incluso debajo de chaquetones y abrigos para la estaciÃ³n invernal .
Lo mejor de todo es su precio , y es que por solo 19,99 euros Zara ha puesto en venta esta chaqueta abierta de punto de manga larga acabada en puÃ±o. La cadena ofrece desde la XS hasta la L para que se adapte a todo tipo de cuerpos y medidas sin ningÃºn tipo de molestia ni incomodidad . No obstante, si estÃ¡s pensando en hacerte con una de ellas, debes saber que mÃ¡s de una talla ya se ha agotado de manera online.
Chaqueta punto. Zara.
La verdad es que su moderno y sofisticado diseÃ±o te permitirÃ¡ utilizarlo con todo tipo de looks en el dÃ­a a dÃ­a de una forma estilosa y elegante . AdemÃ¡s, gracias a sus amplias medidas te sentirÃ¡s como si no llevaras nada .
Asimismo, desde la propia cadena recomiendan lavarla a mÃ¡quina a una temperatura mÃ¡xima de 30 grados sin usar ningÃºn tipo de blanqueador. AdemÃ¡s, para que la prenda te dure mÃ¡s es imprescindible no plancharla ni meterla en la secadora. Por lo tanto, es aconsejable que, tras lavarla, la dejes secar en un tendedero interior .
Sigue los temas que te interesan Consumo Zara

author: Jai Hamid
title: Celsius Network gets green light for Bitcoin mining
text: Cryptocurrency lender Celsius Network has received the green light to make a strategic shift into [bitcoin mining](https://www.cryptopolitan.com/how-to-mine-bitcoin/), following approval from a [U.S.](https://www.cryptopolitan.com/us-congress-has-had-a-very-dramatic-year/) bankruptcy judge. The decision represents a significant pivot for the company, which had originally aimed to earn fees from validating crypto transactions but had to alter its course after encountering regulatory obstacles. Hereâ€™s a closer look at Celsius Networkâ€™s bold move into the world of bitcoin mining. A Judgeâ€™s Approval for a New Direction In a recent ruling, U.S. Bankruptcy Judge Martin Glenn in Manhattan granted Celsius Network the ability to deviate from its previously approved bankruptcy plan. This decision came after the company faced challenges with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Judge Glenn determined that the new restructuring would not negatively impact creditors or customers, thus allowing Celsius Network to proceed with its bitcoin mining venture. Celsius Networkâ€™s journey to bitcoin mining began when it filed for Chapter 11 protection in July 2022. This move was in line with several other crypto lenders who faced financial difficulties amidst the rapid growth of the industry during the COVID-19 pandemic. Originally, Celsius had grand plans to generate revenue by validating crypto transactions and exploring new business avenues. However, the SECâ€™s rejection of this plan prompted a strategic shift. The change in direction also meant that the lender would no longer work with certain outside bidders who were initially chosen to oversee the new company. Instead, the responsibility for running the creditor-owned mining business fell squarely on the shoulders of mining company US Bitcoin Corp. Celsiusâ€™ Fahrenheit Consortium US Bitcoin Corp, founded by Hut 8â€™s Asher Genoot, was originally part of a consortium of bidders known as â€œFahrenheit.â€ This consortium also included Arrington Capital and was intended to manage Celsius Network alongside other companies. However, with the pivot to bitcoin mining, Celsius parted ways with these bidders, leaving US Bitcoin Corp as the primary manager. While the shift in focus was deemed significant by some creditors and the U.S. Department of Justiceâ€™s bankruptcy watchdog, Judge Glenn ultimately approved the deal without calling for a new vote by creditors. Despite initial concerns that this change was not in line with what creditors had originally voted on, Celsius Network was granted the opportunity to move forward with its bitcoin mining plans. Celsius Network now looks ahead to emerging from bankruptcy in early 2024. The companyâ€™s scaled-back bankruptcy plan not only allows for the pursuit of bitcoin mining but also frees up $225 million in cryptocurrency assets. These assets were initially intended to fund new business lines that were rejected by the SEC. Benefits for Customers As a result of this strategic pivot, more cryptocurrency assets from Celsius will be returned to customers. Additionally, customers will receive equity shares in the new bitcoin mining venture. This move represents a unique approach to bankruptcy restructuring, one that aims to ensure that creditors and customers are not left in a worse position. Celsius Networkâ€™s foray into bitcoin mining is a testament to the evolving landscape of the cryptocurrency industry. As regulatory challenges continue to shape the sector, companies are finding innovative ways to adapt and thrive. This bold move by Celsius Network signals its determination to explore new opportunities in the world of digital assets.

author: Henry Sinnott
title: Dave Marrs Issues Special â€˜Thank Youâ€™ Message Amid Harsh Conditions
text:
HGTV star Dave Marrs is showing his gratitude. The â€œFixer to Fabulousâ€ star woke up on January 14 to find fresh snow around his Bentonville, Arkansas home, along with below-freezing temperatures, with the air temperature hitting below-zero degrees Fahrenheit at its lowest points.
Since Dave and his wife/co-host Jenny Marrs live on a farm with a plethora of animals, one side effect of the cold weather was the freezing-over of the animals water supply, a matter Dave dealt with in a
January 14 Instagram post. â€œWe only have a small farm, and the work never ends; no matter how hot or ðŸ¥¶ cold out. The animals need water, which means cutting ice. Right about now, Iâ€™m wishing for that Arkansas August heat! Stay safe out there,â€ Dave captioned his post.
Daveâ€™s post included a video of the HGTV star taking a chainsaw to a patch of ice to free up the water beneath, with the caption â€œHow did we get here so quick!!!! ðŸ¥¶ðŸ¥¶ðŸ¥¶Thank you to all the farmers and ranchers out there who canâ€™t take a day off!â€ written over the video.
Fans Share Dave Marrsâ€™ Gratitude
Fans jumped into Daveâ€™s comment section to echo his feelings of gratitude towards farmers and ranchers who were hard at work despite the below-zero forecast, and some even extended that gratitude towards Dave himself.
â€œAnd here I was worried about getting bird seed in my feeders. Amen to thanks to anyone who has animal farms! â¤ï¸â€ one fan wrote.
â€œIâ€™m wishing for a little warmer weather here too! We have around 15 below temps here and wind chills around 35 to 40 below. Yikes! We just busted ice out of water pails for our animals and thatâ€™s even in the barn. ðŸ¥¶â€ another fan shared.
â€œUnless you are a farmer or have family that farms, people really do not understand. I have extended family that farms. They all take one day off when I was a kid to go see a Cubs game. One. Day,â€ a third user added.
â€œI can just hear Jenny Marrs voice during that. Dave. DAve DAVE MARRS ( louder and louder ) and Dave just smiling back at her with reassurance. Be safe Marrs family,â€ one fan wrote, referencing Dave standing on ice as he was cutting it in his video post.
Jenny Marrs Shared Her Own Message of Gratitude
While Dave was hard at work making sure their familyâ€™s animals were being taken care of, Jenny was practicing self-care with two of her close friends. â€œTwo of my dearest friends in all the world flew in for the weekend and we stayed at The Welcome Inn together,â€ Jenny explained in a
January 15 Instagram post.
While Jenny and her girlfriends usually go away to a new city on their annual trip, she mentioned her friends offered to visit her in Bentonville as she was exhausted from a busy year of renovation, filming â€œFixer to Fabulousâ€, and
releasing and promoting her first book â€œHouse + Love = Homeâ€.
â€œIt was the absolute best gift because they also know how anxious I get to fly â€“ and they do too â€“ but they did it anyway. I canâ€™t get over their selflessness to care for me in a way I didnâ€™t realize I needed until they were here,â€ Jenny shared.
READ NEXT:
Bryan Baeumler Announces Fate of â€˜Renovation Resort Showdownâ€™

author: SocietÃ  Editrice Athesis S.p.A.
title: NBA: Victor Wembanyama fuori fino a termine della regular season | G. di Vicenza
text: ROMA, 20 FEB - La stella dei San Antonio Spurs, Victor Wembanyama, salterÃ  il resto della stagione regolare NBA a causa di una trombosi venosa alla spalla destra. Lo ha annunciato la stessa franchigia statunitense. Il problema di salute Ã¨ stato diagnosticato "al ritorno di Wembanyama a San Antonio dopo l'All Star Game a San Franscisco", dove il giocatore ventunenne ha partecipato lo scorso fine settimana per la prima volta nella sua carriera, ha precisato la franchigia texana in un comunicato. Il rientro in campo Ã¨ previsto ad aprile, quando la stagione regolare sarÃ  giÃ  conclusa. E difficilmente gli Spurs si qualificheranno per i playoff. Il francese potrebbe perÃ² disputare Euro-2025 con la sua nazionale dal 27 agosto al 14 settembre: i blues sono impegnati con Lettonia, Cipro, Finlandia e Polonia..

author: Ryan Dickstein
title: McDonald's bathroom altercation leads to murder in Harford County
text:
BELCAMP, Md. â€” Charging documents shed more light on what led to a man's murder inside a Harford County McDonald's.
Sebashton Charles Nocar, 19, was shot to death Tuesday night at the fast food chain on Riverside Parkway in Belcamp.
A witness with Nocar, told deputies about an earlier altercation with someone inside the bathroom of the restaurant.
Cameras inside the McDonald's captured the incident, which provided detectives with photos and a description of the alleged shooter.
Investigators also spoke to a clerk at a nearby store, where the gunman reportedly went after the shooting.
The clerk told police the suspect frequented the store, and worked at the McDonald's.
Restaurant management later helped identify the suspect as Djbril Ramatoulay.
RELATED: 19-year-old shot to death inside Harford County McDonald's, alleged gunman arrested
In fact, police say there was a report of Ramatoulay acting disorderly at the McDonald's just one week prior to the shooting.
Online court records show Ramatoulay was on probation at the time of the murder. He was convicted of felony first-degree assault back in 2018, and received 13-years, but a judge suspended the entire sentence.
Ramatoulay was instead placed on five-years supervised probation, which records say he violated twice, yet remained free anyway.
Ramatoulay is currently being held without bail. He's next due in court on May 23.

author: Daniel Laguna
title: GTA VI: fans make live-action version of the trailer and the result will surprise Rockstar | LevelUp
text: Grand Theft Auto VI was revealed with an incredible trailer that broke records and delighted all fans of the franchise. Some fans decided to make their own version of the trailer in the locations where Rockstar Games was inspired to create the world of the new installment. The result is a live-action trailer that delighted the community and that, surely, will also bring a smile to the developers of the title. As you can imagine, the project by youtuber Andrew Levitt caught the attention of many and currently already has thousands of views. Youtuber makes live-action version of the first trailer of GTA VI Levitt and his collaborators pored over every frame of the GTA VI trailer, which is full of interesting city details. In this way they searched for and found the places that inspired certain of the scenes in Rockstar's official video. Subsequently, they visited them to make a few recordings. In addition, they recreated the social media posts that appear in the trailer, the driving scenes, the final store robbery, and there is even a special appearance of the Florida Joker. The people who give life to Lucia and Jason, the main characters of the game, did a great job, as they recreate their personalities very well and even add funny details to the video, such as the bananas they use as guns in the final scene. The result surprised all fans of the franchise, who believe that the video captures the essence and atmosphere of GTA VI very well. We won't tell you more and we leave you the live-action trailer below:
